title: RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK13004 PWM Expander Module Overview
content: The RAK13004 is a PWM expander module that can be mounted to the IO slot of WisBlock Base board. It can be controlled 16-channel LED, and the module uses PCA9685 from NXP, I2C interface.
parent_content: The RAK13004 is a PWM expander module that can be mounted to the IO slot of WisBlock Base board. It can be controlled 16-channel LED, and the module uses PCA9685 from NXP, I2C interface.

title: RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > Overview > Applications > Overview of LED Functionality
content:
- RGB or RGBA LED drivers
- LED status information
- LED displays
parent_content:
- RGB or RGBA LED drivers
- LED status information
- LED displays

title: RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK13004 Module Mounting on WisBlock Base Board
content:
The RAK13004 module can be mounted to the IO slots of the WisBlock Base board. Figure 1 shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK13004 on a WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Mounting
parent_content:
The RAK13004 module can be mounted to the IO slots of the WisBlock Base board. Figure 1 shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK13004 on a WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Mounting

title: RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > RAK13004 PWM Expander Module PCA9685 Device Addressing [TABLE]
content:
The RAK13004 PWM Expander Module uses PCA9685 from NXP Semiconductors.  
| Vendor             | Part Number |
| ------------------ | ----------- |
| NXP Semiconductors | PCA9685     |  
Figure 2 shows PCA9685 device addressing. Default A5, A4, and A3 are connected to ground, and A2, A1, and A0 are optional. It can be connected to 3.3V or GND. Default 7-Bits I2C address is 0x80.  
> **Image:** The PCA9685 device addressing
parent_content:
The RAK13004 PWM Expander Module uses PCA9685 from NXP Semiconductors.  
| Vendor             | Part Number |
| ------------------ | ----------- |
| NXP Semiconductors | PCA9685     |  
Figure 2 shows PCA9685 device addressing. Default A5, A4, and A3 are connected to ground, and A2, A1, and A0 are optional. It can be connected to 3.3V or GND. Default 7-Bits I2C address is 0x80.  
> **Image:** The PCA9685 device addressing

title: RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Pinout and Connector Details
content:
The RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module comprises a standard WisConnector. The WisConnector allows the RAK13004 module to be mounted on a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in Figure 3.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **I2C** related pins, **OE**, **3V3_S**, and **GND** are connected to this module.
- **OE** output enable pin, low active, internal pull-up, disable output.
parent_content:
The RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module comprises a standard WisConnector. The WisConnector allows the RAK13004 module to be mounted on a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in Figure 3.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **I2C** related pins, **OE**, **3V3_S**, and **GND** are connected to this module.
- **OE** output enable pin, low active, internal pull-up, disable output.
- **3V3_S** voltage output from the WisBlock Base that powers the RAK13004 module can be controlled by the WisBlock Core via WB_IO2 (WisBlock IO2 pin). This makes the module ideal for low-power IoT projects since the WisBlock Core can totally disconnect the power of the RAK13004 module.  
> **Image:** RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Pinout

> **Image:** RAK13004 WisBlock PWM Expander Module Pinout
